title: Decagon Calculator (Area, Perimeter, Side, Inradius, Circumradius)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Perimeter: \( P = 10s \) Area: \( A = \frac{5}{2} s^2 \sqrt{5 + 2\sqrt{5}} \approx 7.69420884\, s^2 \) Inradius (apothem): \( r = \dfrac{s}{2 \tan(\pi/10)} \) Circumradius: \( R = \dfrac{s}{2 \sin(\pi/10)} \approx 1.618\, s \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
